description:
Description:-
Add some helpful docs like docs in the web-app project to help newbies to get started. It will be helpful for GCI candidates or refer this link (https://github.com/openMF/web-app/tree/master/docs)
in readme.md

Steps to Reproduce:-
Move to https://github.com/openMF/web-app/tree/master/docs and look at the docs, which may be fruitful for the newbies.

Expected Behaviour:-
There should be docs like as in web-app project (https://github.com/openMF/web-app/tree/master/docs)

Actual Behaviour:-
For now, there are no docs. Only contributing.md is there for getting started.

Settings:-
Mifos X version: 17.07.01.RELEASE
Browser used:Chrome
OS: Ubuntu
name: Add some helpful docs like docs in web-app project to help newbies to get started
